channel.title: Donator cape
channel.description:
Hello guys im currently hosting this 317 PI
And I'm looking for to add a donator cape I alrdy got the codes and the models but where do I add the models to? Please help me , thanks in advance and btw my donator cape is ( case : 12742 ) If I try to spawn it it spawns me a gecko... so Please help me :) highly apreciated :)

item.title: Donator cape
item.dc:creator: @Keyal Keyal
item.description:
@Keyal wrote:

[quote=“I InDrEk I, post:7, topic:444852”][quote author=Keyal link=topic=547537.msg4014687#msg4014687 date=1339524574]
tried no tut says where to put the models…
[/quote]Take a look at this topic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=363483.0[/quote]I really don’t get it man could you please teamview me or something ?

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Keyal, post:3, topic:444852”]tried no tut says where to put the models…[/quote]Take a look at this topic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=363483.0

item.title: Donator cape
item.dc:creator: @Keyal Keyal
item.description:
@Keyal wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:5, topic:444852”][quote author=I InDrEk I link=topic=547537.msg4014682#msg4014682 date=1339524507]
How about doing a little research on google or using the moparscape search button ?
[/quote]

Your a dick… You say that because you don’t actually know the answer which leads me to thinking you post for post count and that’s all.

@topic:
If by models you mean the .Dat files then depending on the client you’ll need to put it in either “models” or something similar, when you see lots of .Dat files it will probably be in the right place, after that you need to add the ints for the item to “class 8” or “Itemdef”.

This is client sided though so you’d get a better response in the client help section.[/quote]Thanks man! Helped me i’ll have a look now ty for the reply ! , If I put the ints in the item def.java and try to compile it it gives loads of errors?

Read full topic

item.title: Donator cape
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

I InDrEk I:

How about doing a little research on google or using the moparscape search button ?

Your a dick… You say that because you don’t actually know the answer which leads me to thinking you post for post count and that’s all.

@topic:
If by models you mean the .Dat files then depending on the client you’ll need to put it in either “models” or something similar, when you see lots of .Dat files it will probably be in the right place, after that you need to add the ints for the item to “class 8” or “Itemdef”.

This is client sided though so you’d get a better response in the client help section.

Read full topic
